definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

pinyin: guang1 xian1 fen1 san4 shi4 zi1 liao4 jie4 mian4
gong4 tong2 zha2 dao4 jie4 mian4
tu2 xiang4 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4
ying4 yong4 cheng2 shi4 jie4 mian4
wang3 lu4 jie2 dian3 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: It exposes a limited surface area of full-trust code.
sentences.chinese: 它會公開完全信任程式碼的有限介面區。

sentences.english: If cabling is correct, power off the device and reseat the interface card.
sentences.chinese: 假如纜線連接是正確的，關掉設備且重新插入介面卡。

sentences.english: On the class diagram, select the type for which you want to view the base class or interface.
sentences.chinese: 在類別圖表上，選取要檢視其基底類別或介面的型別。

sentences.english: The command line options will override the choices made in the GUI.
sentences.chinese: 這些命令行選項將會蓋掉您原來在圖形介面下的選項。

sentences.english: The types referenced by this collection must consist of interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 這個集合所參考的型別必須由介面所組成。

sentences.english: A class or struct can implement more than one interface.
sentences.chinese: 類別或結構都可實作多個介面。

sentences.english: The backlit user interface only lights up as you approach the M100.
sentences.chinese: 背光式的使用者介面只隨著你靠近M100而發亮。

sentences.english: This allows the interfaces to negotiate these settings.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可容許介面能夠交涉這些設定。

sentences.english: Above: Digtal overhead projector's software interface and the projector itself.
sentences.chinese: 以上爲實體投影機的軟體介面與實機。

sentences.english: The type parameter is not used as a generic constraint for the interface methods.
sentences.chinese: 型別參數不能當做介面方法的泛型條件約束使用。

sentences.english: French FriendFinder includes both English and French interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 法語交友中心包含了英語及法語介面。

sentences.english: An alternative approach is to set port security on a switch interface.
sentences.chinese: 另一個方法是在交換器介面上設定連接埠安全性。

sentences.english: Interfacial tractions at the broken ends will produce delamination.
sentences.chinese: 斷頭處的介面引力將引起分層。

sentences.english: You can customize the whole diagram or the individual types on the design surface.
sentences.chinese: 也可以在設計介面上自訂整個圖表或個別型別。

sentences.english: The icon-based interface also required thought.
sentences.chinese: 圖示化的介面也需要思考。

sentences.english: Eliminate the need for a standard mouse interface allowing users to use voice commands.
sentences.chinese: 消除需要有一個標準滑鼠介面，讓用戶使用語音命令。
